# Supported Languages

59 languages are currently supported.

| Language          | Files                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Supported comments                        |

| Assembly          | `*.asm`, `*.a51`, `*.i`, `*.inc`, `*.nas`, `*.nasm`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `;`, `/* */`                              |
